languageKey.label: Directories: Comma-separated list of directories to be monitored
File types: Comma-separated list of file types to be handled.
Size threshold: Images larger than this value will be resized (allowed units: B|K|M)
Maximum width: Images will be resized up to this maximum width
Maximum height: Images will be resized up to this maximum height
Automatic orientation: Will try to automagically orient image (useful with photos)
Keep profile/metadata: If active, IM will not use $GLOBALS['TYPO3_CONF_VARS']['GFX']['im_stripProfileCommand']
Image %s has been automatically resized to %sx%s pixels
